titleStmt.title: An account of the treaty between His Excellency Benjamin Fletcher Captain General and Governour in Chief of the Province of New-York, &c. and the Indians of the Five Nations viz. the Mohaques, Oneydes, Onnondages, Cajonges and Sennekes, at Albany, beginning the 15th of August 1694.
Treaties, etc. Iroquois Indians, 1694 Aug. 15
titleStmt.author: New York (State).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by William Bradford ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
